attrs.name: closable
attrs.desc: Set whether alarms can be disabled.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: icon
attrs.desc: Set the alarm icon. By default, the corresponding icon is automatically used based on the value of type.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Set the warning size to nomal or large. The default value is nomal. ;The value of this attribute can be nomal or large
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is normal.

attrs.name: title
attrs.desc: Set the warning title. This parameter is valid only when size is set to large. By default, the alarm title is automatically set based on type.

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Set the alarm type. The value of this attribute can be success / warning / info / error
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is info.

attrs.name: description
attrs.desc: Set the warning prompt content. The default value is null.

attrs.name: center
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: close-text
attrs.desc: Customized text of the close button

attrs.name: show-icon
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

events.name: close
events.desc: Event triggered when the alert function is disabled
